Soup - Up

Passionate about noodle soups like I am? You found the right place to look for a quick and healthy recipe. Discover and Enjoy your next soup.

Recommendations

Instructional

These are the basic instructions for an amazing noodle soup. Please follow them step by step.

Bring water to boil. Ideal temperature should be medium-high.

Meanwhile prepare your ingridients. And keep them in order. E.g. vegetables which are harder need longer cooking time (carrots, broccoli) prepare them first and set them apart.

Prepare your spice mix and put them in the water. Stir, so they get distributed.

Once the water started boiling, put inside you ingredients in order to the relative cooking time. At last put the noodles inside and wait untill noodles are soft (ca. 5min).

Careful!

If the noodles are ricenoodles, cook them seperatly from the soup and rinse them after they are done cooking. Then put them into a bowl and poor the finished soup on it

For the final touch

Sprinkle garnish, like chili, spring onion oder cilantro on it.

Food is passion.

Hello soup fans. I discouvered my love for noodle soups in 2020 during the pandemic where I took my free time to cook. Since then I have been eating one bowl of noodle soup daily and it has been awesome. Perfectly fitted as a lightweight and healthy meal, I can highly recommend them as a diet.
So Soup-up .

Some of the recipes are using instant noodles packages containing MSG. It is advisable not to eat instant noodles daily.
